ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:29:18 [Issue ID 4000-86694] urn:comicvine:4000-86694 urn:metron:issue/dark-horse-presents-1986-18/ Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:00:59. [Issue ID 44518]
ComicInfo.Summary: Paul Chadwick's Concrete appears on the cover, and inside views another revealing episode of his favorite late-night TV show, Sky of Heads. Also inside, Mark Badger's Masque takes yet another bizarre twist, and Rich Rice's hilarious Bob the Alien (in his debut!) tries to get a date. Another "must have" issue of Dark Horse's flagship title.
ComicInfo.Tags: Central Intelligence Agency,Larry Munro,Bob the Alien,The Mask (Dark Horse),Concrete
ComicInfo.Title: A Sky of Heads: Quality Time; Masque (Part 7); College Party
